TopicTitle: Reapers Dutch Designs (my last craft before the 1.0 update) a dropship

here is my last craft before.

It's really stylish! Dropship's shapes are really cool. And i like its cockpit ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Great job!

P.S. It's a pity, that I "must spread some Reputation around before giving it again" to you

> 
> It's really stylish! Dropship's shapes are really cool. And i like its cockpit ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Great job!
> P.S. It's a pity, that I "must spread some Reputation around before giving it again" to you

np nik glad you like it and i can wait for the rep ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

hey!!! you made those H2O vtols. thanks for the vtol engine idea.

> 
> It's dropship fever! ![:cool:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cool.gif)
> Cupcake...

I just saw the avenger new film.

i think im inspired lol

time for a quin jet replica

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-25T10:43:36Z" title="04/25/2015 10:43  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 25, 2015</time> by soulreaver1981**
Awesome craft as usual reaver, look forward to seeing what you build in 1.0

> 
> I just saw the avenger new film.
> i think im inspired lol
> 
> time for a quin jet replica

Isn't this kind of it already? It even has a similar passenger capacity! And I chuckled at my mention on the video... mine looks much, much worse. Even if it is balanced better. The way you build yours though, you could probably move the CoM upwards (and gain stability) by shifting stuff like fuel under the beautiful hull you built. The problem, though, is that the shape of the Quinjet makes it probably pitch downwards in RL, unless the tail is angled a lot to counteract the torque form the downwards facing front...

Rune. Who knows? Maybe it'll still fly on 1.0, it isn't that crazy of a design.
